title: Keys to a Great Interview - Gregway 05.29.24
description:
If you love what we do and haven’s supported or haven't supported in a while, come on back for August and pitch in on patreon.com/kindafunny or youtube.com/kindafunny with your Kinda Funny Membership!

The Kinda Funny Membership gets you Ad-Free and Exclusive Shows: https://www.youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames/join
http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny

Kinda Funny Xcast – An Xbox Podcast: https://bit.ly/36twqvD

y y right uh but active listening is what it's all about and then it's about asking the obvious question uh you know I go back all the time to when I was in journalism school and of course you know writing for the school papers in high school and grades or Junior High I guess before then and stuff like that and how much I hated interviewing people right I distinctly have a like seared in memory of being at the antler house which of course where I lived in college having my notepad my legal yellow notepad filled with questions and calling whoever I was calling uh to interview right and I think it was when I was doing this cops and courts story for like j105 for journalism 105 at missou where I had I we had to go to the we had to go to the court for a day sit in just watch all these cases pick a case to write a story about and so like I had sat in on this kid who got arrested for graffiti Who was the and blah and so like then I had to go track him down through the phone book and this
